item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Six Bottle System, Bottles C, D, E & F

remarks.para: One bottle and associated indications may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: For Combi, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULD's), or fly away kits,
For Passenger/Combi/Freighter with Draw-Through Smoke Detection System, flight remains within 148 minutes of landing at a suitable airport,
For Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System, flight remains within 258 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.
The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Flight remains within 258 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

placard.para: Placard adjacent or on fire control module located on pilots overhead panel "LOWER CARGO COMP FIRE EXT SYST INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
